duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and inspire a retail team to achieve sales goals and create a positive customer experience.
Build and maintain strong relationships with customers to drive sales and repeat business.
Implement merchandising and visual concepts to enhance the store's appeal and drive sales.
Coach and develop retail team members to promote sales and internal career growth.
Analyze reports and identify opportunities to make merchandising and presentation adjustments.

education_certification.credential: College Degree in Business or a related degree
